actions.text: On agreeing to the Kuhl (NY) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment names a portion of Interstate 86 in upstate New York in the vicinity of the City of Corning, as the "Amo Houghton Bypass".
purpose: An amendment numbered five printed in Part B of House Report 109-14 to name a portion of Interstate 86 in upstate New York, in the vicinity of the City of Corning, the "Amo Houghton Bypass", after Former Congressman Amo Houghton who retired from Congress in 2004 after serving 18 years.
